thread.title: Sheldon Fishman
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Sheldon Fishman

author: Sheldon Fishman
title: Sheldon Fishman
text: The product shipped almost instantly. The parts and pieces as beautifully engineered and seem to be of the highest quality. The Owners Manual and instructions were clear and need to be followed carefully. After several days of operation, the water is clear and clean. Not sure yet how well the system will soften the water.
